alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY... At 302 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minerva Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Worthington, Bexley, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Minerva Park, Ohio State University, Easton, Whitehall, Grandview Heights, Obetz, Urbancrest, Valleyview and Marble Cliff. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 92 and 109. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 98 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
